channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: The Morning After: Elon Musk's fascination with Dogecoin continues
item.description: Today’s headlines: Elon Musk Dogecoin efficiency tweet pushes prices up again, Framework’s modular DIY laptop is available to pre-order and Nokia relaunches a flip-phone in the US.

item.title: Ireland's health service shuts down IT systems after ransomware attack
item.description: Ireland's Health Service Executive has been hit with a ransomware attack causing it to shut down its IT network and resort to pen and paper records.

item.title: The Pentagon is tracking US citizens without a warrant, Senator says
item.description: The Pentagon may be using commercial data to track Americans without due legal process, according to a letter from Senator Ron Wyden.

item.title: Netflix is making a CG-animated 'Ultraman' feature film
item.description: Netflix is developing an Ultraman CG-animated feature film in partnership with Tsuburaya Productions.

item.title: Fisker, Foxconn deal to build EVs in the US is 'signed and sealed'
item.description: The iPhone manufacturer is teaming up with Fisker to build an electric car.

item.title: ESPN+ will stream La Liga soccer starting next season
item.description: After losing Italy's Serie A to Paramount+, ESPN has announced a deal with Spain's La Liga for next season.

item.title: Elon Musk efficiency tweet pushes Dogecoin prices up again
item.description: Doge prices spiked after Elon Musk tweeted about "potentially promising" work to make the meme cryptocurrency more efficient.

item.title: SpaceX charts a path for Starship's first orbital test flight
item.description: In a filing with the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), the company details how it hopes its latest test flight will unfold.

item.title: Pinterest will test livestreamed events with three days of creator workshops
item.description: Starting on May 24th, Pinterest will host a three-day online event that will see the company livestream content from some of its popular content creators.

item.title: Disney cuts the theater-exclusive window in half for 'Free Guy,' 'Shang-Chi'
item.description: New Disney movies will only be exclusive to theaters for 45 days instead of 90.

item.title: Twitter finally brings DM search to Android
item.description: Nearly two years after introducing a search feature to DMs on iOS and the web, Twitter is finally bringing the update to Android.

item.title: Facebook clarifies hate speech policies following Oversight Board recommendations
item.description: In response to a decision the panel came to on a video involving two individuals wearing blackface, the company says it will tweak the policy rationale section of its community guidelines on hate speech to add more context on why it prohibits harmful stereotypes.

item.title: 'Friends: The Reunion' hits HBO Max on May 27th
item.description: HBO Max will begin streaming Friends: The Reunion on May 27th.

item.title: Amazon detective show 'Bosch' returns for its final season on June 25th
item.description: With seven seasons under its belt, 'Bosch' has had a longer run than most streaming shows.

item.title: Itch.io won't take a cut of game sales on May 14th
item.description: This Friday, May 14th, indie game storefront Itch.io will hold its first-ever Creator Day.

item.title: The Rock's 'Jungle Cruise' movie will hit Disney+ the same day as theaters
item.description: You can pay $30 to stream it at home on July 30th.

item.title: The best games for Nintendo Switch
item.description: Here's a list of the best games for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch Lite, as chosen by Engadget editors.

item.title: Framework’s modular DIY laptop is available to pre-order
item.description: Each module is replaceable, which should hopefully make it last for a lot longer.

item.title: Netflix's 'Masters of the Universe' premieres July 23rd with action figures in tow
item.description: Netflix is premiering Kevin Smith's 'Masters of the Universe: Revelation' series on July 23rd, and it's showing off the matching action figures.

item.title: Discord is making it easier to find servers hosting live speakers
item.description: In June, Discord will roll out a feature called Stage Discovery.

item.title: These Klipsch wireless earbuds are on sale for $120
item.description: This pair of refurbished Klipsch T5 II True Wireless Earphones provide up to eight hours of playback or 32 hours with the included charging case.

item.title: Sony reveals new galaxy-inspired PS5 DualSense controllers
item.description: You'll soon be able to pick up Midnight Black and Cosmic Red versions.

item.title: 'Grand Theft Auto V' mod adds uncanny photorealism through AI
item.description: Researchers have used machine learning to add photorealism to 'Grand Theft Auto V,' hinting at the future of AI-assisted graphics in games.

item.title: Brain implant lets people with paralysis write using their minds
item.description: Researchers from Stanford University have created a brain chip interface that allows the paralyzed to write on-screen using their thoughts.

item.title: The Nokia 2720 Flip phone is finally coming to the US
item.description: HMD Global is releasing the Nokia 2720 V Flip in the US on Verizon.
